languages.text: "Надо же, они все сумели облажаться... Какие талантливые у меня подданные!"
"They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"
languages.original_text: "Надо же, они все сумели облажаться... Какие талантливые у меня подданные!"

traits.locale_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"
"They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"
"They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"
"They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"
"They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

languages.text: "Sie haben es richtig vermasselt, was? Die Talente meiner Untertanen erstaunen mich immer wieder aufs Neue!"
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben es richtig vermasselt, was? Die Talente meiner Untertanen erstaunen mich immer wieder aufs Neue!"

languages.text: « Ils ont vraiment mis un sacré bazar, n'est-ce pas ? Les dons de mes sujets en la matière ne cesseront jamais de surprendre ! »
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont vraiment mis un sacré bazar, n'est-ce pas ? Les dons de mes sujets en la matière ne cesseront jamais de surprendre ! »

languages.text: “他们还真是把事情搞得一团糟啊，你说呢？我的臣民真是太有能耐了，总能给我带来惊喜！”
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: “他们还真是把事情搞得一团糟啊，你说呢？我的臣民真是太有能耐了，总能给我带来惊喜！”

languages.text: «Han liado una buena, ¿no es así? ¡Los talentos de mis súbditos nunca dejan de sorprenderme!».
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: «Han liado una buena, ¿no es así? ¡Los talentos de mis súbditos nunca dejan de sorprenderme!».

languages.text: 「見事にめちゃくちゃにしてくれたな？{mf|俺|私}の臣民たちの才能には、毎度ながら驚かされるよ！」
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: 「見事にめちゃくちゃにしてくれたな？{mf|俺|私}の臣民たちの才能には、毎度ながら驚かされるよ！」

languages.text: "Ortalığı yangın yerine çevirmişler, değil mi? Tebaamın becerilerine ben de hayret ediyorum doğrusu!"
languages.original_text: "They've made a right mess of this, haven't they? The talents of my subjects never cease to amaze me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ortalığı yangın yerine çevirmişler, değil mi? Tebaamın becerilerine ben de hayret ediyorum doğrusu!"
